name: Detective Donovan and the Price of Love
name_original: Detective Donovan and the Price of Love
description:
A game created originally for the Coventry University Game Jam.

Help Detective Donovan, an excellent private eye with a broken gaydar find Althea Jynx - a very close 'sister' of Carmen.

Talk to a bunch of random people to uncover the mystery, and find the true Price of Love.

2D Art by M Bogdanis.

The game has issues as it is a game jam game - the plan is to completely restructure and flesh out the dialogue system, but overall I am quite happy with what I created in less than 48h.
